name: Step by star
summary:
It is a game that I make a some change based on my first game. The game is very easy, good control your finger, and see next step is on which side, if you touch the right side of the player (that means the dango), you can turn right, similarly, if you touch the left side of the player, you can turn left. 
 
The flow speed will become more and more fast. If you bump in the deep of the screen or hit the space, the gameover come.
